channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: George Clooney Recalls Early Hollywood Days, from Meeting Tony Bennett to Getting ‘Yelled at by Frank Sinatra’ (Exclusive)
item.description: “I remember he (Frank) was mad at me once because I led this boycott about [...] some press freedoms, and he called me because people thought he was sick and there were helicopters flying over his [home], and he called me going, ‘It's not working what you're doing!’ ”
